data.Name: Kawehi
data.Bio: Kawehi is a Fuse TV selected artist and one of Music Connection Mag's "Hot 100 Unsigned Artist." Manned by her guitar, 'uke and Boss RC-30 Looping station, Kawehi creates her own band with beatboxing, guitar/bass loops and background vocals - all live. Catch this Hawaiian native on tour at a school/festival/club near you! http://vimeo.com/iamkawehi http://soundcloud.com/iamkawehi http://kawehi.bandcamp.com Read more on Last.fm
